name: Steven Price
text: Aspire lets developers be developers again.

name: Russ Harding
text: I had someone start on a Monday morning and they were contributing code by lunch.

name: Nick Chapsas
text: The best thing that happened in .NET since it went open source in 2014!

name: Milan Jovanović
text: I was surprised by how quickly Aspire got me from idea to running services.

name: Nk54 (Reddit User)
text: I've never wanted to commit to a Microsoft technology this much.

name: Craig Taylor
text: Hit F5 to begin — skip the setup boss fight, ship code faster.

name: Sean Killeen
text: Aspire was easy to integrate with our existing container orchestration.

name: Dan Clarke
text: OpenTelemetry out-of-the-box in the Aspire dashboard is a game changer for observability!
